issues: Missing aria-label or aria-labelledby for table
No scope attributes on th elements
Missing caption element for table description
Empty state message not announced to screen readers
No sortable column indicators (if sorting is intended)
fixes: Add aria-label or caption to table
Add scope='col' to all th elements
Add role='status' to empty state message
Add keyboard navigation for interactive rows
Consider adding aria-sort for sortable columns
Add aria-rowcount and aria-rowindex for large tables
